proposeBattle(uint16,uint16,uint256[4]).details: TODO: proposals are still managed by both a mapping and a struct array, it shold be impled with interval tree

params.fixedSlotsOfProposer: the character party that the proposer is gonna use in battle he proposes.
params.lowerBound: lower bound of the  opponent level that the proposer wanna fight. it is uint16 because it is sum of four characters' level (uint8)
params.upperBound: upper bound of the opponent level

params.fixedSlotsOfChallenger: the character party that the challenger is gonna use in battle he requests to join.
params.proposer: the address of proposer whose proposal challenger wants to request against

proposeBattle(uint16,uint16,uint256[4]).notice: A Battle proposer creates battle proposal and the proposer state is updated

requestChallenge(address,uint256[4]).notice: request challenge against a proposal  (challenger: The side applying for a battle against a battle proposal.) if it passes all requirements for battle beginning, it calls startBattle()

documentation.text: @notice The number of the fixed slots that one player has.
@notice interface to the dealer of polylemma.
